button_role_type_i: The issue in the code snippet is that the button element is marked as presentational with the role="presentation" attribute, but it has global ARIA (role) and tabindex attributes, which contradicts the purpose of a presentational element. The correct version of the code snippet should be: In this corrected version, the role="presentation" attribute is removed, allowing the button to have its default semantics and be focusable by default without needing tabindex.
